name: DietaryRecommendations
title: Dietary Recommendations
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for recommendations and education for diet and nutrition.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Intervention or Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent recommendations and education for diet and nutrition.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; re-assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; group (2 or more individual(s)), each 30 minutes
